mobiles.name: oldstyle child gnome
mobiles.long_description: A gnome child is playing around here.
mobiles.description:
The little tyke looks so innocent playing with his boomerang that you 
just want to pick him up and hug him.

mobiles.name: oldstyle woman gnome
mobiles.long_description: A gnome woman is standing here, trying to look beautiful.
mobiles.description:
The woman is short and gnarled, but acts like a woman several times her beauty.
She's starting to look pretty attractive to you ...

mobiles.name: oldstyle man gnome
mobiles.long_description: A gnome man is walking here, on his way to work.
mobiles.description:
This is a prime example of a gnome.  He looks short and weak, but at the
same time an intelligent creature who could outsmart you.

mobiles.name: oldstyle scientist gnome
mobiles.long_description: A scientist wanders around deep in thought.
mobiles.description:
You see a gnome who is lost deep into some invention that he is about
to make.  His hair is white, but he looks fairly strong.

mobiles.name: oldstyle guard gnome
mobiles.long_description: A gnome guard stands here guarding something.
mobiles.description:
This is a well trained gnome.  He might not have a lot of strength but
he makes up for it with his weapons skill.

mobiles.name: oldstyle chief gnome
mobiles.long_description: A powerful looking gnome stands here wearing ornate clothes.
mobiles.description:
The Chief looks like he could whap you hard.  He looks not only powerful
but wise and resourceful.  You better not mess with him.

mobiles.name: oldstyle troll small
mobiles.long_description: A small troll grunts as he takes a swing at you.
mobiles.description:
The small troll is a short and stocky beast with a human-like face
but with the eyes and fangs of a wild beast.

mobiles.name: oldstyle mouse field
mobiles.long_description: A small mouse runs across your foot.
mobiles.description: The Mouse is a cute little creature.

mobiles.name: oldstyle rat
mobiles.long_description: A small rat shrieks and runs around.
mobiles.description: The rat is a little evil creature that deserves death.

mobiles.name: oldstyle rat large
mobiles.long_description: A large rat runs up to you and nibbles on your boots.
mobiles.description: You have the urge to kill this vile creature.

mobiles.name: oldstyle rat giant
mobiles.long_description: A giant rat growls at you and prepares to attack.
mobiles.description: This rat has grown up to be the size of an average dog.

mobiles.name: oldstyle troll
mobiles.long_description: A giant troll lumbers around.
mobiles.description:
You see before you a huge mass of living flesh.  You cringe in fear as
he lifts his powerful arm to bludgeon you.

mobiles.name: oldstyle bat black
mobiles.long_description: A black bat hangs from the ceiling.
mobiles.description: The bat is a grotesque little creature with large wings and fangs.

mobiles.name: oldstyle zombie gnome
mobiles.long_description: A zombie gnome shuffles his way towards you.
mobiles.description:
This is a creature which has passed away long ago.  His body has been
pulled out of its resting place by some evil force.

mobiles.name: oldstyle bat fire
mobiles.long_description: The fire bat flames brightly and prepares to attack.
mobiles.description:
You see a huge flame which resembles the shape of a bat.  The creature
hangs from the ceiling and bites at you.

mobiles.name: oldstyle guard hobgoblin
mobiles.long_description: The hobgoblin guard attacks first, thinks later.
mobiles.description:
This is an extra large, extra ugly goblin like creature.  He grins evilly
as he attempts to brain you.

mobiles.name: oldstyle soldier hobgoblin
mobiles.long_description: A hobgoblin soldier stands here.
mobiles.description:
This is just a low life hobgoblin, who couldn't make it to the ranks
of the elite guards.  He looks pissed.

mobiles.name: oldstyle bodyguard hobgoblin
mobiles.long_description: A hobgoblin bodyguard guards the king with his life.
mobiles.description:
This is one of the elite hobgoblin guards.  He stands tall for his short
stature.  He grins a toothy grin as he prepares to attack.

mobiles.name: oldstyle king hobgoblin
mobiles.long_description: There is a great king here, sitting in his throne.
mobiles.description:
The king is a silly looking hobgoblin whose muscles bulge out of his robes,
destroying the sophisticated effect he was trying to create.

mobiles.name: oldstyle miner hobgoblin
mobiles.long_description: A hobgoblin miner stands here looking for gold.
mobiles.description: The miner is totally covered in dust.

mobiles.name: oldstyle treasurer hobgoblin
mobiles.long_description: A treasurer is here counting out money.
mobiles.description:
The hobgoblin treasurer is an old goblin with glasses.  It appears that he
can only see a couple feet in front of him.

mobiles.name: oldstyle prisoner gnome
mobiles.long_description: A gnome prisoner is here resting in the straw.
mobiles.description: The prisoner is just barely alive.

mobiles.name: oldstyle prisoner human
mobiles.long_description: A human prisoner is here resting in the straw.
mobiles.description: The prisoner is just barely alive.

mobiles.name: oldstyle hermit crab
mobiles.long_description: A hermit crab crawls towards you.
mobiles.description:
The hermit crab is about 5 feet high and looks mad that you had the nerve
to wake it up.

mobiles.name: oldstyle cook hobgoblin
mobiles.long_description: A hobgoblin cook stands here cooking something.
mobiles.description:
The cook is a dirty and fat hobgoblin.  He burps as he stirs up something
in a pot.

objects.name: key bloody
objects.description: A bloody key is stuck to the floor.

objects.name: toy boomerang
objects.description: A toy boomerang wants to be picked up.

objects.name: sword gnome
objects.description: A gnome sword catches your eye.

objects.name: shield studded
objects.description: A studded wooden shield lies here.

objects.name: cloak bloody
objects.description: A bloody cloak lies in a corner.

objects.name: ring bat
objects.description: A ring in the shape of a bat lies here.

objects.name: necklace bead
objects.description: A string of beads is here.

objects.name: boots gnome
objects.description: You notice a pair of Gnome Boots.

objects.name: mail heavy banded
objects.description: A large suit of heavy banded mail is here

objects.name: life potion
objects.description: A potion of life healing has left here.

rooms.name: Entrance to Gnome Village
rooms.description:
You stand on a dusty path that leads north and east.  To the east you hear
the sounds of a small village.

exits.exit_description: A dusty path heads towards the eastern road.

rooms.name: A Dusty Path
rooms.description:
This is a path leading into the village.  It continues east and west and
there is a small house to the north.

rooms.name: A Road in the Village
rooms.description:
This road runs north and south through the center of the village.  There
are a few people moving around, but not many.

rooms.name: A Dusty Path
rooms.description:
You are on a dusty path on the far side of the village.  Houses are to the
north and south, while the path continues east.  There is a sign here.

extra_descriptions.description:
Warning:  The area to the east was written mostly by Vougon
                    (giggle)    - Sandman

rooms.name: A Road in the Village
rooms.description:
This road runs north and south through the center of the village.  There
are a few people moving around, but not many.

rooms.name: A Road in the Village
rooms.description:
This road runs north and south through the center of the village.  There
are a few people moving around, but not many.

rooms.name: A Road in the Village
rooms.description:
This road runs north and south through the center of the village.  There
are a few people moving around, but not many.

rooms.name: A Road in the Village
rooms.description:
This road runs north and south through the center of the village.  There
are a few people moving around, but not many.

rooms.name: A Small Gnome House
rooms.description:
This is a small suburban house made from quality wood.  You can see the
expert workmanship that went into making it, but it lacks creativity.

rooms.name: A Small Gnome House
rooms.description:
This is a small suburban house made from quality wood.  You can see the
expert workmanship that went into making it, but it lacks creativity.

rooms.name: A Small Gnome House
rooms.description:
This is a small suburban house made from quality wood.  You can see the
expert workmanship that went into making it, but it lacks creativity.

rooms.name: A Small Gnome House
rooms.description:
This is a small suburban house made from quality wood.  You can see the
expert workmanship that went into making it, but it lacks creativity.

rooms.name: A Small Gnome House
rooms.description:
This is a small suburban house made from quality wood.  You can see the
expert workmanship that went into making it, but it lacks creativity.

rooms.name: A Gnome Shop
rooms.description:
You are in one of the several shops of this fine town.  The wares look fine,
but unfortunately the gnomes don't do business with outsiders.

rooms.name: A Gnome Shop
rooms.description:
You are in one of the several shops of this fine town.  The wares look fine,
but unfortunately the gnomes don't do business with outsiders.

rooms.name: A Gnome Shop
rooms.description:
You are in one of the several shops of this fine town.  The wares look fine,
but unfortunately the gnomes don't do business with outsiders.

rooms.name: Path by a Stream
rooms.description:
You are on a small path leading north and west, that is surrounded on the
other two sides by a small stream.  The water looks mighty cold.

extra_descriptions.description: The stream is pretty small, but it looks too cold to swim.

rooms.name: Path by a Stream
rooms.description:
You are on a small east-west path.  The path shows new grass, as if it
has stopped being used sometime in the recent past.  A river is to the south,
and a small hut is to the west.

exits.exit_description: You see a small hut that is starting to fall apart.

extra_descriptions.description: The hut looks well built, but it seems to have taken some damage.
The stream is pretty small, but it looks too cold to swim.

rooms.name: A Small Hut
rooms.description:
The hut is a mess!  Blood has stained the grass walls into a dark rich
crimson color.  Torn clothes and trash lie all around, and you think you
see a skeleton in the corner.

extra_descriptions.description:
The skeleton still has a little flesh clinging to it and it is definitely
humanoid.  The skull has been cracked open, but it is otherwise undamaged,
except by time.

rooms.name: On the Stream
rooms.description:
The stream is cold and frigid, yet it supports plenty of life beneath its
surface.  The current trickles west and there is a field to the south.

rooms.name: On the Stream
rooms.description:
The current here flows from the east, but a logjam blocks you from 
continuing onward.

rooms.name: The Field of Mice's Dreams
rooms.description:
This is a large green field of waist high grass.  You feel something
scurry over your feet.  There is a cave to the east.

exits.exit_description: You see a dark mysterious cave.

rooms.name: The Dark Cave
rooms.description:
The cave gleams as your light reflects off of it.  As you squint your eyes
and try to look ahead, you think you see something move.

rooms.name: Darker Cave
rooms.description:
The cave gets even darker as your terror grows stronger.  You fear for your
life as something emerges out of the shadows.

rooms.name: A Dusty Path
rooms.description:
You are on a well traveled path that leads in many directions.  To the north
is a large house, and to the west is a fortress.

exits.exit_description: You see a large white house.
You see the gateway to a large fortress.

extra_descriptions.description: The fortress is a large gnome stronghold to defend the city.

rooms.name: The Iron Gateway
rooms.description:
You stand at the entrance to the gnome fortress.  The place seems to be
well fortified.

rooms.name: A Long Hallway
rooms.description:
You are now inside of the fortress; you must be lucky that the guards 
haven't killed you.  As you glance around, you notice that the walls and
floors are spotlessly cleaned.  The barracks are to the north and a
storage room is to the south.

rooms.name: A Long Hallway
rooms.description:
You are now inside of the fortress; you must be lucky that the guards 
haven't killed you.  As you glance around, you notice that the walls and
floors are spotlessly cleaned.  A mess hall is to the south.

rooms.name: The Barracks
rooms.description:
You now stand in the sleeping quarters of the gnome guards.  Every bed is
made perfectly, and not single article of clothing is on the floor.  There
is a small storage room to the east.

exits.exit_description: You see a small storage room.

rooms.name: A Small Storage Room
rooms.description:
This is where the gnomes store all their spare clothing and armor.
There is not much here, but you might come up with something.

rooms.name: A Small Storage Room
rooms.description:
This is where the gnomes store all their spare weapons.  A door leads off
to the east.

rooms.name: A Small Storage Room
rooms.description:
This is yet another room for storing gnome stuff.  Maps and battle plans
are stored in neat stacks on the shelves.

rooms.name: The Mess Hall
rooms.description:
You are in the room where the guards come to get their grub.  The benches 
and tables are neatly cleaned and straightened, while shiny plates line
the walls.

rooms.name: A Small Room
rooms.description: This is a small plain room.  Its only interesting feature is a ladder down.

rooms.name: A Small Unused Room
rooms.description:
You stand in a small room in an unused section of the fortress.  The whole
room is coated with dust and cobwebs.  The ladder leads back up, and
a rusty door is to the east.

rooms.name: Dark Hallway
rooms.description:
You find yourself in a very old section of the fortress.  You must be the
first person to pass through here in years.  The hallway continues south
and a door leads off to the east.

rooms.name: Torture Chamber
rooms.description:
This is a room that was once used to extract lies out of helpless victims.
The machines look unused, but could still work.

extra_descriptions.description:
The machine consists of a large rack with winches on each end.  You can 
almost feel them pulling your arms out of their sockets.

rooms.name: Dark Hallway
rooms.description:
The hall continues in a north-south direction.  The floor is coated with
some kind of molded slime.  Doors lead east and west.

rooms.name: Dark Hallway
rooms.description:
The hall continues in a north-south direction.  The floor is coated with
some kind of molded slime.  Doors lead east and west.

rooms.name: Prison Cell
rooms.description:
You are in a dark and nasty prison cell.  Bodies lying on the floor give off
an unbearable stench.

rooms.name: Prison Cell
rooms.description:
You are in a dark and nasty prison cell.  Bodies lying on the floor give off
an unbearable stench.

rooms.name: Prison Cell
rooms.description:
You are in a dark and nasty prison cell.  Bodies lying on the floor give off
an unbearable stench.

rooms.name: Prison Cell
rooms.description:
You are in a dark and nasty prison cell.  Bodies lying on the floor give off
an unbearable stench.

rooms.name: End of the Dark Hallway
rooms.description:
You have reached the end of the dark hallway and maybe the end of your puny
life.  Something lumbers its way out of the shadows.

rooms.name: A Ladder
rooms.description: You have come into a vertical tunnel with a ladder.

rooms.name: Lair
rooms.description:
You have entered a new lair in the fortress.  Anything could be lurking
around the corner.

rooms.name: A Damp Hallway
rooms.description:
You are wandering in a dark, damp, twisting hallway.  The temperature
seems to be greater here, as well as your fear.

rooms.name: A Damp Hallway
rooms.description:
You are wandering in a dark, damp, twisting hallway.  The temperature
seems to be greater here, as well as your fear.

rooms.name: A Damp Hallway
rooms.description:
You are wandering in a dark, damp, twisting hallway.  The temperature
seems to be greater here, as well as your fear.

rooms.name: A Damp Hallway
rooms.description:
You are wandering in a dark, damp, twisting hallway.  The temperature
seems to be greater here, as well as your fear.

rooms.name: A Damp Hallway
rooms.description:
You are wandering in a dark, damp, twisting hallway.  The temperature
seems to be greater here, as well as your fear.

rooms.name: A Damp Hallway
rooms.description:
You are wandering in a dark, damp, twisting hallway.  The temperature
seems to be greater here, as well as your fear.

rooms.name: A Damp Hallway
rooms.description:
You are wandering in a dark, damp, twisting hallway.  The temperature
seems to be greater here, as well as your fear.

rooms.name: A Damp Hallway
rooms.description:
You are wandering in a dark, damp, twisting hallway.  The temperature
seems to be greater here, as well as your fear.

rooms.name: The End of the Hallway
rooms.description:
You make your way out of the hallway, just to find yourself in greater
danger.  Before you looms the source of the great heat.

rooms.name: The Altar
rooms.description:
You finally reach the end of the maze.  There is a great altar here in the
shape of a bat.  A passageway leads off to the west.

rooms.name: The Chief's House
rooms.description:
You enter into a large and luxurious house.  The floor is coated with carpets
and the walls are covered in paintings.  You feel privileged just for stepping
inside.

rooms.name: The Unused Path
rooms.description:
You are now on a fairly unused path that leads east out of the village.  
You wonder what could be out this way.

rooms.name: The Overgrown Path
rooms.description:
As the path continues on, the grass grows higher.  You can't imagine
what could possibly be out this way.

rooms.name: The Clearing
rooms.description:
Your progress is suddenly stopped by mountains on all sides.  The path leads
back to the west, and there appears to be an old mine shaft to the north.

rooms.name: Entrance to the Mine Shaft
rooms.description:
As you enter the mine shaft, you get a sudden fear of the walls closing
in on you.  You are surprised to notice that you don't need a light.

rooms.name: Mine Shaft
rooms.description:
This mine shaft looks stable, at least in this area.  The wooden supports are
thick and strong.  Torches line the walls.  Exits lead in all directions.

exits.exit_description: You see a small mine shaft.

rooms.name: Mine Shaft
rooms.description:
This mine shaft looks stable, at least in this area.  The wooden supports are
thick and strong.  Torches line the walls.  Exits lead in all directions.

rooms.name: Mine Shaft
rooms.description:
This mine shaft looks stable, at least in this area.  The wooden supports are
thick and strong.  Torches line the walls.  Exits lead in all directions
except north.

rooms.name: Walkway
rooms.description:
You are on a well built path in the middle of a mountain.  You sense something
great up ahead, considering the hard work that must have gone into creating
this passage.

rooms.name: Walkway
rooms.description:
You are on a well built path in the middle of a mountain.  You sense something
great up ahead, considering the hard work that must have gone into creating
this passage.

rooms.name: The Grand Hall
rooms.description:
You have stepped into the Grand Hall of the hobgoblin kingdom; your luck
must be running low by now.  Golden pillars span the hallway, and you
notice a red carpet beneath your feet.

rooms.name: The Throne Room
rooms.description:
This is large bright room filled with Hobgoblins.  To the south there is
a large golden throne against the wall.

rooms.name: The Treasury
rooms.description:
You are inside the hobgoblin's treasury.  Your eyes are almost blinded by the
gold, silver and copper coins.

rooms.name: Guarded Room
rooms.description:
You are inside a well guarded room.  The place is slightly better built than
the mine shafts, and is lit by lanterns.

rooms.name: Guarded Room
rooms.description:
You are inside a well guarded room.  The place is slightly better built than
the mine shafts, and is lit by lanterns.

rooms.name: Hobgoblin Armory
rooms.description:
The guards store their spare weapons and armor here.  There are rusty swords
on rotting shelves, and armor hanging from hooks or laying on the floor.

rooms.name: Mine Shaft
rooms.description:
You enter a part of the mine shaft where the torches have grown dim
and are almost ready to go out.  From what you can see, there are plenty
of cobwebs on the walls and rats at your feet.

exits.exit_description: You see a dark and nasty room.

rooms.name: Entrance to a Dungeon
rooms.description:
The floor dips slightly as you walk into this dark and nasty place.  Your
skin crawls as you look at the filth on the walls and see it move.  Most
of the exits lead into jail cells.

exits.exit_description: You see a dark and nasty room.

rooms.name: A Dungeon
rooms.description:
You are in the deepest and darkest part of the mine shafts.  The light from
the torches barely reaches to where you are.  Most directions from here
lead to jail cells.

exits.exit_description: You see a dark and nasty room.

rooms.name: A Jail Cell
rooms.description:
You are in a musty, dark jail cell.  Wet and dirty straw covers the floor.
The walls glisten with slime.  You see something stir in the straw.

exits.exit_description: You see a dark and nasty room.

rooms.name: The Jail Cell
rooms.description:
You are in a musty, dark jail cell.  Wet and dirty straw covers the floor.
The walls glisten with slime.  You see something stir in the straw.

exits.exit_description: You see a dark and nasty room.

rooms.name: The Jail Cell
rooms.description:
You are in a musty, dark jail cell.  Wet and dirty straw covers the floor.
The walls glisten with slime.  You see something stir in the straw.

exits.exit_description: You see a dark and nasty room.

rooms.name: The Jail Cell
rooms.description:
You are in a musty, dark jail cell.  Wet and dirty straw covers the floor.
The walls glisten with slime.  You see something stir in the straw.

exits.exit_description: You see a dark and nasty room.

rooms.name: The Jail Cell
rooms.description:
You are in a musty, dark jail cell.  Wet and dirty straw covers the floor.
The walls glisten with slime.  You see something stir in the straw.

exits.exit_description: You see a dark and nasty room.

rooms.name: Small Mine Shaft
rooms.description:
You are in a small extension of the mine shaft.  The dust on the floor is
undisturbed by footprints.

exits.exit_description: You see a small mine shaft.

rooms.name: Hobgoblin Barracks
rooms.description:
You are suddenly surrounded by a small army of hobgoblin guards.  The room
itself is a mess with clothes and armor everywhere.  The beds are unmade and
stained.

rooms.name: Hobgoblin Barracks
rooms.description:
Yech!  As you continue forward, the smell just keeps getting worse.
What are you DOING here?

rooms.name: Mess Hall
rooms.description:
You stand in the hobgoblin eating area.  There are a few rotting tables
and many broken dishes scattered around the room.  You almost slip on a
rotten piece of meat, but catch yourself just in time.

rooms.name: A Store Room
rooms.description: You stand in a small room filled with flour, grain, fruit, and bat droppings.

rooms.name: The Kitchen
rooms.description:
This kitchen hasn't been cleaned since the creation of humans.  The trash and
spoiled food laying on the floor reach up to your knees.  Off to the side a
pot is boiling over.  A human hand floats in it.

rooms.name: A Small Mine Shaft
rooms.description:
You come to a place in the mine shaft where a tunnel leads down.  The
small passage continues north and south.

exits.exit_description: You see an almost caved in area.
You see a small mine shaft.

rooms.name: Hermit's Lair
rooms.description:
You are in a small section where the mine wall has collapsed to reveal a
tiny one-room cave.  The area is barely lit, but you can make out something
moving towards you.

exits.exit_description: You see a small mine shaft.

rooms.name: A Hole
rooms.description: You are in a hole.

exits.exit_description: You see a small mine shaft.
